Hi,

Sorry, I am a little new to this.

From what I understand, there is a =
cmdline-jmxclient available for control over Heritrix using command line in=
stead from the web-interface. 

May I know from where may I be able to find=
 some example commands on how I can control Heritrix via this client (i.e s=
tarting a job)?

Much thanks and regards,
Ng Zi Kai
